game.name: Rosemary Village
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as Ferdinand, a young adventurer in search of a new journey. In Rosemary Village, even the simplest adventure can put a lot at stake, and in it, Ferdinand's will and power will be his main weapons.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Ferdinand, a young adventurer in search of a new journey. In Rosemary Village, even the simplest adventure can put a lot at stake, and in it, Ferdinand's will and power will be his main weapons.
